00020 require_once 'simbio_pgsql_result.inc.php';
00021 
00031 class simbio_pgsql extends simbio
00032 {
00033     private $db_host = '';
00034     private $db_port = '';
00035     private $db_name = '';
00036     private $db_username = '';
00037     private $db_passwd = '';
00038     private $res_conn = 0;
00039     public $affected_rows = 0;
00040     public $insert_id = 0;
00041     public $errno = 0;
00042 
00052     public function __construct($str_host, $str_username, $str_passwd, $str_dbname, $int_port = 5432)
00053     {
00054         $this->db_host = $str_host;
00055         $this->db_port = $int_port;
00056         $this->db_name = $str_dbname;
00057         $this->db_username = $str_username;
00058         $this->db_passwd = $str_passwd;
00059         // execute connection
00060         $this->connect();
00061     }
00062 
00063 
00069     private function connect()
00070     {
00071         $this->res_conn = @pg_connect("host=".$this->db_host." dbname=".$this->db_name.
00072             " user=".$this->db_username.
00073             " password=".$this->db_passwd.
00074             " port=".$this->db_port);
00075         if (!$this->res_conn) {
00076             $this->error = "Database fail to connected. \n".pg_last_error($this->res_conn);
00077             parent::showError(true);
00078         }
00079     }
00080 
00081 
00088     public function query($str_query = '')
00089     {
00090         if (empty($str_query)) {
00091             $this->error = 'Cant send query because query was empty';
00092             parent::showError(true);
00093         } else {
00094             $_result = new simbio_pgsql_result($str_query, $this->res_conn);
00095             // get any properties from result object
00096             $this->affected_rows = $_result->affected_rows;
00097             $this->errno = $_result->errno;
00098             $this->error = $_result->error;
00099             $this->insert_id = $_result->insert_id;
00100             // return the result object
00101             if ($this->error) {
00102                 return false;
00103             } else {
00104                 return $_result;
00105             }
00106         }
00107     }
00108 
00109 
00116     public function escape_string($str_data)
00117     {
00118         return pg_escape_string($this->res_conn, $str_data);
00119     }
00120 
00121 
00127     public function close()
00128     {
00129         pg_close($this->res_conn);
00130     }
00131 }
